about_the_game:
TOY SCRAPPERS

A unique multiplayer horror and escape game for 2 to 16 players! Become a crazy clown and hunt down your prey, or play as a toy and try to survive the madness!

SURVIVE THE MADNESS, STAY ALIVE!

As a toy caught in the middle of crazy clowns, hide and try to stay alive without being caught. Increase your chances of survival with special abilities!

  • Decoy: Create a copy of yourself to confuse your pursuers!

  • Prop: Turn into an object and blend into your surroundings!

  • Illusion: Spawn 8 copies of yourself to vanish in the chaos!

  • Invisibility: Disappear completely and escape without a trace!

BECOME A CRAZY CLOWN!

As a clown, your goal is to find the hidden toys on the map. Hunt them down and turn them to your side! Use your special abilities to trap them!

  • Trap: Place a trap on the ground and wait for them to get caught!

  • Sense: Feel nearby enemies and locate them!

TOY SCRAPPERS offers an unforgettable experience filled with laughter and thrills to share with friends. Will you be the hunter or the hunted?

content_descriptors.notes:
"Toy Scrappers" is a thrilling chase-based horror game where some players takes on the role of a killer attempting to capture other players. The game includes:

Horror Elements: Jump scares, dark environments, and unexpected events designed to create a tense atmosphere.

Violence: The killer performs attack animations on toy characters. These animations involve mild violence but do not include blood or excessive gore.

Psychological Tension: Players may experience heightened tension due to the thrill of escaping or being pursued.

The game does not include sexual content, sexual violence, drug use, alcohol, or self-harm. However, it may not be suitable for players sensitive to intense horror or suspenseful themes.
